title: Drawing, "Study for Hunger on Wheels, New York Subways Advertising Co., Inc.", ca. 1949
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Head in three-quarter profile of a man wearing a pince-nez, a black fedora, and blue bowtie against a mustard yellow background. Left, in black on blue arrow: HUNGER; right, in white and black: ON WHEELS.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for Hunger on Wheels, New York Subways Advertising Co., Inc.", ca. 1949.
ca. 1949. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-608.
